version_description:
Update KB0031: Improvements and fixes.
This update includes various improvements. Key changes include:
- Provides Progressbar Mi skin
- Provides Progressbar 2000 skin
- Provides less fast gameplay
- Provides some UI/UX improvements.

Update KB0037: Improvements and fixes.
This update includes various improvements. Key changes include:
- Provides Progressbar XB skin
- Provides paid Ads Free version
- Provides Wallpaper manager (you can now select a wallpaper from the list)
- Provides Lasers
- Addresses an issue with language detection

Update KP0043: Improvements and fixes.
This update includes various improvements. Key changes include:
- Provides Progressbar Wista skin
- Provides Progressbar 7 skin
- Provides in-game Store (it includes: Ad free version and skins)
- Provides new elements: 'Mad buttons' and 'Calculator'
- Provides ProgressDOS
- Provides a new Begin menu that is active all the time
- Provides Options and Help windows
- Provides a faster UI (it now depends on your in-game CPU)
- Provides a little delay before the Mines become active
- Provides only horizontal lasers, the vertical ones were removed
- Provides some fixes for the Calculator
- Addresses issues the progress saving
- Addresses an issue with the background blinking

Update KP0045: Improvements and fixes.
Key changes include:
- Provides Progressbar 81 skin
- Provides difficulty levels: Relax,Normal and Hardcore (and a secret Bonus one)
- Provides new items: a null item and a mystery item.
- Provides some improvements for the ProgressDOS keyboard and a couple of new ProgressDOS commands
- Provides new level elements
- Addresses issue with the level 100

Update KP0047: Improvements and fixes.
This update includes various improvements. Key changes include:
- Provides Progressbar 10 skin
- Provides Italian, German and Portuguese localization
- Provides a new tool: ScanProgress
- Provides a new tool: Firewall
- Provides some gameplay tuning (less gray elements and so on)
- Provides a new element: the Dog
- Provides some new secret stuff

Update KP00475: Improvements and fixes.
This update includes various improvements. Key changes include:
- Addresses an issue with a black screen on iPhone X models

Update KP0049: Improvements and fixes.
This update includes various improvements. Key changes include:
- Provides new skins: Progressbar 3.14, 2, 1
- Provides Spannish, Polish and Ukrainian localization
- Provides a new element: The Bonus ball
- Provides a new segment: green (very rare)
- Provides a CRT overlay
- Addresses an issue with an error inside error in Progressbar XB
- Addresses an issue where tutorial had tips placed outside the screen on iPads

Update KP00495: Improvements and fixes.
This update includes various improvements. Key changes include:
- Provides new skins: Progressbar 3.14, 2, 1
- Provides Spannish, Polish and Ukrainian localization
- Provides a new element: The Bonus ball
- Provides a new segment: green (very rare)
- Provides a CRT overlay
- Addresses an issue with an error inside error in Progressbar XB
- Addresses an issue where tutorial had tips placed outside the screen on iPads

Update KP0051: Improvements and fixes.
This update includes various improvements. Key changes include:
- Provides new skin: Largehorn
- Provides a support for multi-touch
- Provides a support for iCloud sync
- Provides a support for Game Center leaderboards
- Provides a new level bonuses: Symmetry, Tube etc
- Provides RMDIR command for ProgressDOS for removing directories.
- Provides new ProgressDOS elements (new puzzles and bonuses)
- Provides an onscreen keyboard in ProgressDOS
- Provides a brand new cheat-code system
- Provides Slow time feature

Update KP00512: Improvements and fixes.
This update includes various improvements. Key changes include:
- Addresses an issue with iCloud saving
- Provides new skin: Largehorn
- Provides a support for multi-touch
- Provides a support for Game Center leaderboards
- Provides a new level bonuses: Symmetry, Tube etc
- Provides RMDIR command for ProgressDOS for removing directories.
- Provides new ProgressDOS elements (new puzzles and bonuses)
- Provides an onscreen keyboard in ProgressDOS
- Provides a brand new cheat-code system
- Provides Slow time feature

Update KP0055: Improvements and fixes.
This update includes various improvements. Key changes include:
- Provides new skin: Whisper
- Provides a new game mode: Progress Sweeper
- Provides a new game mode: Progress Defender
- Provides new level bonuses
- Provides updated ProgressDOS
- Provides music
- Provides support for user wallpapers
- Addresses an issue with the 7 day counter

Update KP0057: Improvements and fixes.
This update includes various improvements. Key changes include:
- Provides new skin: Progressbar 1X
- Provides a new game mode: Progresstein 3d
- Provides a new game element: radial progress bar
- Provides logon screens for PB XB-XB1X
- Addresses an issue with the CRT overlay on iPad

Update KP0057: Improvements and fixes.
This update includes various improvements. Key changes include:
- Provides new skin: Progressbar 1X
- Provides a new game mode: Progresstein 3d
- Provides a new game element: radial progress bar
- Provides logon screens for PB XB-XB1X
- Addresses an issue with the CRT overlay on iPad

Update KP005900: Improvements and fixes.
This update includes various improvements. Key changes include:
- Provides new skin: PB-DOS Shell
- Provides a new game mode: ProgressTrix
- Provides a new game mode: Progress Commander
- Provides a new game element: Bin (a digital pet)
- Provides achievements
- Provides a special screen layout for iPhone X/11

Update KP006200: Improvements and fixes.
This update includes various improvements. Key changes include:
- Provides new skin: Progressbar Chitown
- Provides a new settings for desktop wallpapers
- Provides a tool to adjust GUI on devices with screens that feature rounded corners
- Provides a support for mouse cursors
- Provides a sleep mode for BIN
- Addresses an issue with PB10-1X crash on start
- Address an issue with the Store

Update KP006300: Improvements and fixes.
This update includes various improvements. Key changes include:
- Provides new skin: Progressbar NOT 4.0
- Provides a game mode with a custom difficulty (available only in PB NOT 4.0)
- Provides Japanese and Romanian localization

Update KP006500: Improvements and fixes.
This update includes various improvements. Key changes include:
- Provides new skin: Progressbar NOT 3.60
- Provides visual themes for selected systems
- Provides custom mouse pointers
- Provides a sliding puzzle mini-game for Wista and Largehorn systems
- Provides a new item called 'Product key'
- Provides new achievements

Update KP006700: Improvements and fixes.
This update includes various improvements. Key changes include:
- Provides an alternative line of systems: BarOS and Progresh computers
- Provides new skins: BarOS,BarOS Sys 2 and BarOS Sys 3
- Provides new game mechanics for basic game modes (only for BarOS)
- Provides a file manager (only for BarOS)
- Provides new bonuses: Magic Pink and Outer space

Update KP006900: Improvements and fixes.
This update includes various improvements. Key changes include:
- Provides new skin: BarOS Sys 4
- Provides new skin: BarOS Sys 5
- Provides new skin: BarOS Sys 6 (with support for color segments)
- Provides a pattern editor for BarOS that lets you to create custom patterns

Update KP006910: Improvements and fixes.
This update includes various improvements. Key changes include:
- Provides new skin: BarOS Sys 4
- Provides new skin: BarOS Sys 5
- Provides new skin: BarOS Sys 6 (with support for color segments)
- Provides a pattern editor for BarOS that lets you to create custom patterns

Update KP007100: Improvements and fixes.
This update includes various improvements. Key changes include:
- Provides a new skin: BarOS 7
- Provides new game modes (for BarOS 7): Color, Jigsaw puzzle
- Provides a pattern editor (for BarOS 7)

Update KP007300: Improvements and fixes.
This update includes various improvements. Key changes include:
- Provides a new skin: BarOS 8
- Provides new game mode: Progressbar XL a numeric maze.

Update KP007300: Improvements and fixes.
This update includes various improvements. Key changes include:
- Addresses an issue with PB XL crashes on start
- Provides a new skin: BarOS 8
- Provides new game mode: Progressbar XL a numeric maze.

Update KP007400: Improvements and fixes.
This update includes various improvements. Key changes include:
- Provides a new skin: BarOS 9
- Provides a virtual mailbox. Interact with it to get bonus points.
- Provides a popup with a shield for PB Defender.

Update KP008400: Improvements and fixes.
This update includes various improvements. Key changes include:
- Provides a new game mode: Progressball pinball
- Provides some updates to My menu
- Provides some updates to Progresstein 3D, it is easier to catch segments

Update KP008600: Improvements and fixes.
This update includes various improvements. Key changes include:
- Provides a new skin: BarOS 12 Seacathorse
- Provides a new game mode: Tag (only in BarOS 12)
- Provides a secret system
- Provides additional mouse pointers

Update KP008800: Improvements and fixes.
This update includes various improvements. Key changes include:
- Provides a new special system: Progressbar Nepbar
- Provides a new game mode: Progressolitaire (solitaire)
- Provides Calendar to plan your weekly activities
- Provides support for notifications from Bin

Update KP00929: Improvements and fixes.
This update includes various improvements. Key changes include:
- Provides Decompiler Gun, which is a shooter mechanics for basic game modes
- Provides a modified Store (from now it is based on Product keys)
- Provides Bosses for selected game levels
- Provides Haptic feedback (including HDD vibration simulation)
- Provides Experimental and Bonus drivers for Decompiler Gun
- Provides UI/UX improvements
- Fix for PB XL purchase
- Bug fixes
